high_confidence_strategies.name: Probability Anchor Exploitation
high_confidence_strategies.description: Exploit bot tendency to defend key psychological price levels
high_confidence_strategies.implementation: Monitor 25, 50, 75 cent levels for systematic support/resistance
high_confidence_strategies.entry_criteria: Price approaches anchor with momentum, spreads widen
high_confidence_strategies.exit_criteria: Price breaks through anchor or 1-hour time limit

high_confidence_strategies.name: Volatility Liquidity Provision
high_confidence_strategies.description: Provide liquidity when bots withdraw during rapid price moves
high_confidence_strategies.implementation: Detect cascade events, provide tight spreads when others withdraw
high_confidence_strategies.entry_criteria: >5 cent move in <30 seconds, liquidity drops >30%
high_confidence_strategies.exit_criteria: Normal liquidity returns or position filled

medium_confidence_strategies.name: Extreme Price Risk Premium
medium_confidence_strategies.description: Capture risk premiums bots charge at extreme prices
medium_confidence_strategies.implementation: Provide liquidity at 5-15 and 85-95 cent levels with tighter spreads
medium_confidence_strategies.entry_criteria: Price in extreme range, bot spreads >4 cents
medium_confidence_strategies.exit_criteria: Price returns to normal range or position filled

medium_confidence_strategies.name: Information Cascade Fade
medium_confidence_strategies.description: Fade excessive moves during information cascades
medium_confidence_strategies.implementation: Take opposite position after >10 cent move in <60 seconds
medium_confidence_strategies.entry_criteria: Rapid move with no clear fundamental catalyst

experimental_strategies.name: Cross-Contract Arbitrage
experimental_strategies.description: Arbitrage pricing discrepancies between related contracts
experimental_strategies.implementation: Monitor related event markets for pricing inconsistencies
experimental_strategies.validation_needed: Identify truly related contracts and fair value relationships

experimental_strategies.name: Ping Response Exploitation
experimental_strategies.description: Provide liquidity that bots are pinging for
experimental_strategies.implementation: Detect ping patterns and offer the liquidity being sought
experimental_strategies.validation_needed: Confirm ping patterns correlate with larger order flow

implementation_priorities.rationale: High confidence pattern with moderate risk
High profit potential but requires careful risk management
Experimental with high risk but potential for large profits

key_findings: Strong probability anchoring behavior detected at 25, 50, 75 cent levels
Systematic liquidity withdrawal during volatility cascades
Risk aversion patterns at extreme prices (0-15, 85-100 cents)
Ping patterns suggesting liquidity hunting by sophisticated bots
top_exploitation_opportunities: Anchor point trading around psychological levels
Volatility liquidity provision during bot withdrawal
Risk premium capture at extreme prices
recommended_next_steps: Develop volatility detection and response mechanism
Test extreme price liquidity provision strategies
